items.sentence: How long has it been since you've spoken with Tom?
The only thing that I want is for you to be happy.
Do you need more time to finish what you're doing?
Do you consider yourselves fluent French speakers?
Are you going to be able to do that by yourselves?
How certain are you that Tom knows how to do that?
It has been ten years since my father passed away.
My father and my mother were sitting under a tree.
I couldn't attend the party on account of illness.
That's something that I don't know anything about.
Tom didn't know how to respond to Mary's question.
Why in the world would Tom do something like that?
Why do you think I'm the only one who can do that?
Why don't you go home and put on some dry clothes?
When you've finished reading this letter, burn it.
I'm going to sign up for a French class right now.
Could you please speak more quietly? I'm hungover.
The loss adds up to more than one million dollars.
It's been three years since my sister got married.
I'm afraid Tom will get mad at you if you do that.
I wonder if Tom knows how many hours a day I work.
I was told that I need your permission to do that.
I think that Tom will eventually learn to do that.
I think that Tom is expecting someone to help him.
I think Tom doesn't like the way I make spaghetti.
I think Tom doesn't like the kind of music I play.
I swear that I didn't know that Tom would do that.
I hope that we can figure out a way to solve this.
I heard that Tom has married a very wealthy woman.
Do you think that we should discuss this with Tom?
Didn't you suspect Tom and Mary were lying to you?
Tom was punished because he didn't tell the truth.
Have you decided what you're going to do tomorrow?
My life would've been easier if I'd never met Tom.
It would be wonderful if we could travel together.
Tom was actually living in Australia at that time.
How many lawyers do you think there are in Boston?
You're the one who solved the problem, aren't you?
You're the one who told me to do that, aren't you?
You're the one who told me to do this, aren't you?
You're the one who told us to do that, aren't you?
You're the only one who can't do that, aren't you?
You're the worst student in the class, aren't you?
This is one of the fanciest restaurants in Boston.
The first time I saw Tom, I thought he was a girl.
Tom and I almost never speak French to each other.
There's still a lot of work that needs to be done.
Tom asked Mary if she knew where his passport was.
Tom dropped Mary off at school on his way to work.
Tom is aware that the police are looking for Mary.
